install.name: Widget
install.author: Nooku Project
install.description: Module that allows you to render a widget by URL

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: layout
param.label: Render
param.description: Select whether to render the widget inline or using an overlay

param.name: url
param.label: url
param.description: Enter the url to the overlay

param.name: selector
param.label: selector
param.description: Enter the CSS selector for what content to put in the overlay.
